description:
Momoka accidentally switches bodies with... Keroro?!  And then Keroro decides that Natsumi and Fuyuki deserve to be reminded, in black-and-white, B-movie terms, that the platoon is made up of alien invaders from outer space.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momoka, I`m the Sergeant? / Keroro, Invasion Operation from Space
桃華 私は軍曹? であります / ケロロ 宇宙からの侵略者作戦 であります
